description: When you want to look good and feel good too, their Men’s Merino Sport 10" Shorts have you covered. The interior is made from a blend of responsibly sourced Merino wool and polyester, so it’s breathable, thermoregulating, and soft, and the exterior is a lightweight, stretch-woven fabric that’s great for moving. For your next round of golf or a coffee meetup with friends, grab these shorts for a snappy look that’s comfortable as well.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens
